entry.title: $2250 // Large 2 Bed --- Renovated --- 3 Blocks from Train --- Equal Sized Room
entry.content:
Large 2 Bed --- Renovated --- 3 Blocks from Train --- Equal Sized Rooms

Listing ID #: 167944
Price: $2,250
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 2.0
Bathrooms: 1.0
Approx. Size: 800 Sq. Ft.
Floor: 3
Pets: No Pets

Apartment Amenities

Granite Kitchen
Hardwood
High Ceilings
Light
Marble Bath
Renovated

This 2 bedroom sits on 34th avenue between 44th and 43rd street. It is being renovated right now! The bathroom and kitchen are almost completed. The 2 bedrooms are queen sized and have a huge closet. There is also a closet in the main living room area. This apartment is very bright and has 4 large windows. Heat and hot water is included. This apartment is on the 3rd floor. It will be ready for Jan 1.

For a private viewing contact Costa at 347-393-7119 or email me at [email protected]
